Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Caritas Bianchi Lodge in Kowloon (Jordan), you'll be minutes from Jade Market and Yau Ma Tei Fruit Market. This hotel is close to Ladies' Market and Mong Kok Computer Centre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 90 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access is available. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones and safes, and you can also request rollaway/extra beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Caritas Bianchi Lodge.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Caritas Bianchi Lodge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Jade Market - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Yau Ma Tei Fruit Market - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Queen Elizabeth Hospital - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Tung Wah Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Kwong Wah Hospital - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Ladies' Market - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Mong Kok Computer Centre - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Langham Place Mall - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Hong Kong Observatory - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Hong Kong Polytechnics University - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Miramar Shopping Centre - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Hong Kong Polytechnic University - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Hong Kong Museum of History - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Hong Kong Science Museum - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Kowloon Park - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi

The preferred airport for Caritas Bianchi Lodge is Hong Kong (HKG-Hong Kong Intl.) - 24.2 km / 15 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.

Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
